Title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
Writer: Sacha Baron Cohen (screenplay by), Anthony Hines (screenplay by), Dan Swimer (screenplay by), Peter Baynham (screenplay by), Erica Rivinoja (screenplay by), Dan Mazer (screenplay by), Jena Friedman (screenplay by), Lee Kern (screenplay by), Sacha Baron Cohen (story by), Anthony Hines (story by), Dan Swimer (story by), Nina Pedrad (story by), Sacha Baron Cohen (based on character created by)
Actors: Sacha Baron Cohen, Maria Bakalova, Tom Hanks, Dani Popescu
Plot: Follow-up film to the 2006 comedy centering on the real-life adventures of a fictional Kazakh television journalist named Borat.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 23 wins & 33 nominations.
